sense.def:
To have a preference for something
pomeni želeti nekaj imeti ali narediti bolj kot nekaj drugega.

seg.quote: Each of us has personal preferences for certain types of entertainment.
I took the non-stop flight to London, in preference to the two-stage journey via New York.

sense.def:
To give preference to someone
pomeni izbrati neko osebo in ne katero drugo.

seg.quote: Preference was given to those who had overseas experience.
